abilities.desc: At the start of your turn, discard up to 2 Status tokens you hold; then, if you are Bleeding, you heal.
abilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

abilities.desc: At the end of your turn, choose up to two enemies within range and give them each 1 Weakness token.
abilities.trigger: at the end of your turn

actions.name: Bow Down
actions.desc:
Give 1 Weakness token to an enemy within range.
4+: Give 1 Weakness token to each enemy within range.

actions.name: Stand Strong
actions.desc:
1+: Give 1 Power token to an ally within range.
3+: Heal that ally.
5+: Heal and give 1 Power token to a different ally within range.
Usable once per turn.
